entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this morning then clearing. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
